quote: ... it is to your credit that you recognize that if he was a monster then it was other monstrous things which made him so. The iron forged on the anvil cannot be blamed for the hammer...
quote_letters: IT IS TO YOUR CREDIT THAT YOU RECOGNIZE THAT IF HE WAS A MONSTER THEN IT WAS OTHER MONSTROUS THINGS WHICH MADE HIM SO THE IRON FORGED ON THE ANVIL CANNOT BE BLAMED FOR THE HAMMER
